proof: Powering the world’s best product teams

facts.text: Linear is a purpose-built tool for planning and building products.
facts.evidence: Linear is a purpose-built tool for planning and building products

facts.text: Linear streamlines issues, projects, and product roadmaps.
facts.evidence: Streamline issues, projects, and product roadmaps.

facts.text: Linear is made for modern product teams.
Linear is shaped by practices and principles of world-class product teams.

facts.text: Linear provides AI agents for delegating work.
